import React from 'react'; import './Footer.css'; import { Button } from './Button'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Done = ()=>{ return( alert("Thanks For Registration!!! We will contact you soom") ) } function Footer() { return (

Join the Adventure to receive our best vacation deals

A Journey To Share The Experience.

About Us

How it works Testimonials Careers Investors

Contact Us

Contact Support Destinations Sponsorships

Discover

Tickets Visa Agency Tours
{/*

Social Media

Instagram Facebook Youtube Twitter
*/}
TRVL
TRVL Â© 2020
); } export default Footer;
